snippet.title: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero DLC for Pokémon Scarlet or Pokémon Violet - Nintendo Direct 6.21.23
snippet.description:
Learn the latest about The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero DLC for Pokémon Scarlet or Pokémon Violet! https://www.nintendo.com/pokemon-scarlet-violet/

🔴🟣 Join a special school trip to the land of Kitakami in Part 1: The Teal Mask and get to know the residents and customs of Mossui Town!

🔴🟣 Study abroad at Blueberry Academy in Part 2: The Indigo Disk and explore the various environments contained in the undersea Terarium Dome!

#PokemonScarletViolet #NintendoSwitch #NintendoDirect

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
